meanings.definition: A type of sweet pastry or cinnamon roll.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat schnecken for breakfast on Sundays.
meanings.sent2: The bakery down the street makes delicious schnecken.
meanings.sent3: As a treat, my grandma always brings schnecken when she visits.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked schnecken filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The gooey glaze on the schnecken was irresistible.

meanings.definition: A spiral-shaped shell of a snail.
meanings.sent1: I found a beautiful schnecken shell on the beach.
meanings.sent2: The schnecken's shell was intricately patterned.
meanings.sent3: The hermit crab tried to move into the schnecken's abandoned shell.
meanings.sent4: The tiny schnecken shell held memories of the sea.
meanings.sent5: The schnecken shell glistened in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: To move in a slow, twisting manner.
meanings.sent1: The snake began to schnecken its way through the grass.
meanings.sent2: The river seemed to schnecken as it wound through the valley.
meanings.sent3: The dance instructor asked us to schnecken across the floor.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to schnecken as we waited for the train.
meanings.sent5: The road started to schnecken as we reached the mountain pass.
